{::comment} The following block of near-random text was provided by mermaid.live. This is a nifty service that allows you to build complex flowcharts, and in the end it spits out a glob of markdown text that you can copy into a document.

My guess is that the flowchart image itself lives on the mermaid.ink site, and that the following markdown text is operating in a manner similar to an <iframe> tag in HTML.

The image forms a clickable link that will take you to the site where the chart was edited. {:/comment}
